com.groep6.pfor.views.components

Class UIText

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.shape.Shape
        • javafx.scene.text.Text
          • com.groep6.pfor.views.components.UIText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class UIText
extends javafx.scene.text.Text
    Abstracts the most used methods on the Text JavaFX class away with simple to use and chainable methods
    Author:
    Bastiaan Jansen
